CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 12, 1966, pg. 1B reads: " After The Ball - Tired but happy after a gay night of fun, this sextet is pictured waiting for an elevator to carry them down from the Hotel Penn Sheraton's 17th floor where the Kappa Silhouettes Black and White Ball took place. Left to right: Mr. and Mrs. William Adam, Mr. and Mrs. John Martin and Mr. and Mrs. Oliver Ragsdale."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left: Mr. and Mrs. William Adam, Mr. and Mrs. John Martin, and Mr. and Mrs. Oliver Ragsdale, standing in Penn Sheraton Hotel for Kappa Alpha Psi Silhouettes Black and White Ball
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Penn Sheraton Hotel (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Kappa Alpha Psi Fraternity.
